General.preQuizText: In this activity, you will look at samples from students’ proposal emails and identify how the sample can be improved.

Questions.questionText:
Based on this sample, how should this student improve the subject line of their proposal email?

  • TO:
    Jonathan Whitzman
  • FROM:
    Student Name
  • DATE:
    14.03.15
  • SUBJECT:
    Artificial intelligence

answers.answerText: What are the biggest concerns about artificial intelligence
Proposal to study the potential drawback of artificial intelligence

Questions.questionText:
Based on this sample, what could this student do to strengthen their discussion of potential information sources? Select all that apply.

The plan for this essay is to get as much information on A.I. as possible before beginning any writing. I will watch some futuristic movies, read the newest articles and see what the futurists of today are up to; people like Elon Musk and Bill Gates. After the research period, I will write my main points and expand on them based on my vast knowledge.

My plan is to write an essay about A.I. and its rapid progress in the last few years, and what is in store for us in the near future. I am looking to get this approved so I can begin my research.

answers.answerText: Consult sources that are more “academic” than movies
Name specific magazines and websites that are likely to contain reliable and relevant “articles” on this topic
Identify one or two specific publications where Elon Musk and Bill Gates have already discussed this topic.
Name a few specific “futuristic” movies or novels and explain how these kinds of texts might inform your understanding of the topic.

Questions.questionText:
Based on this sample, what could this student do to improve the focus of their introductory paragraph? Select all that apply.

Social media is becoming an increasingly important aspect of our daily lives. The purpose of this proposal is to notify you of my decision to research the impacts of social media on one’s career.

I hope that you agree that the impact of social media on people’s professional lives is relevant to not just my field of study, but to everyone’s future careers as well.

answers.answerText: Delete the sentence “Social media is becoming an increasingly important aspect of our daily lives” because it belongs in the introduction to the final report rather than in the introduction to the proposal.
Change the purpose from “notify you of my decision” to “ask for your approval and feedback”
Delay their consideration of relevance to their field of study until the next paragraph.
Don’t change anything; it’s effective the way it currently is.
